name: Porkmare
description:
You have died, and awaken in an hellish realm with pig monsters turning the tides on humanity and are out to kill you. Can you escape this nightmare?

First ever game developed by myself - Deafelopment
Thanks to Caleb Ralph for making the banger soundtrack!
Reference for development: Miziziziz

Controls:
W - Forwards
A - Left
S - Backwards
D - Right
Space Bar - Jump

Left Mouse - Attack
N - New Game
Esc - Close Game

This was created for the 32bit Game Jam 2022

:)
